game.name: Robo Frenzy
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Slay giant robots and loot their parts to build your own unique, shareable boss battles! Arm yourself with swords, tesla orbs, and potato cannons to capture colossal robos. Customize abilities, style with accessories, and upgrade their attacks to unleash your ultimate boss for the world to fight!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Slay giant robots and loot their parts to build your own unique, shareable boss battles! Arm yourself with swords, tesla orbs, and potato cannons to capture colossal robos. Customize abilities, style with accessories, and upgrade their attacks to unleash your ultimate boss for the world to fight!
